item.title: Why Bad Bunny’s selection as the Super Bowl halftime headliner is sparking MAGA fury
item.description: The Puerto Rican recording artist opposed Trump in 2024 and is avoiding U.S. mainland tour dates to avoid exposing his fans to ICE raids.
